item.description:
Join us for dinner and drinks at Tavolino Pizza Gourmet, newly opened at Patriot Place. Tavolino has a wide range of delicious gourmet pizzas at reasonable prices and a wide selection of other entrees, salads and appetizers. Have fun checking out this new restaurant with fun and friendly people. Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink cost.

Located across from Reebok at Patriot Place in the north retail center. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Dinner at Drinks at Tavolino Restaurant, newly opened at Patriot Place
